Author: vydka
Text: I’m so sorry that’s awful. Can you report her to HR? She shouldn’t be allowed to say things like that to you. Even without an eating disorder that would be scarring to someone.

Author: PhoneWalletSanity
Text: Your coworker is a piece of shit.   *Thiccums*? Wtf, dude, that's super insensitive.   I don't really have advice to offer because I'm a super blunt person and would tell them off right away but I'm glad you've recovered from your mental health episode!
